text: "So Long, Marianne" is a 1967 song written by Canadian poet and musician Leonard Cohen. It was featured on his debut album, Songs of Leonard Cohen. Pitchfork Media placed it at number 190 on their list of "The 200 Greatest Songs of the 1960s." ==References== Category:1967 songs Category:Leonard Cohen songs Category:Songs written by Leonard Cohen
title: So Long, Marianne
